entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment

/** * Copyright (c) 2016-2019 人人开源 All rights reserved. * * https://www.renren.io * * 版权所有，侵权必究！ */package com.leggasai.common.utils;/** * 自定义异常 * * @author Mark sunlightcs@gmail.com */public class RRException extends RuntimeException {    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;        private String msg;    private int code = 500;        public RRException(String msg) {        super(msg);        this.msg = msg;    }        public RRException(String msg, Throwable e) {        super(msg, e);        this.msg = msg;    }        public RRException(String msg, int code) {        super(msg);        this.msg = msg;        this.code = code;    }        public RRException(String msg, int code, Throwable e) {        super(msg, e);        this.msg = msg;        this.code = code;    }    public String getMsg() {        return msg;    }    public void setMsg(String msg) {        this.msg = msg;    }    public int getCode() {        return code;    }    public void setCode(int code) {        this.code = code;    }        }
